name: of Light and Dark
description:
Please Vote Here

----The Game----

By: Michael McFarlane, @MaddeMichael

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare. #LD48

Made Using:

-Code: GameMaker Studio

-Graphics: MSPaint

-Sound: BFXR, My Face, My Desk.

----MAIN OBJECTIVE----

Get to the ladder at the end of the level by using torches, flicking levers, and entering another dimension.

----DEFAULT CONTROLS----

--- IN GAME ---

Movement: WASD

Interect: Space

Movement Modifier (Stand Still): Shift

Pause: P

--- MENU ---

Up: Up

Down: Down

Confirm: Enter

Back: Escape

---ALL CONTROLS CAN BE CUSTOMIZED IN GAME---

---OTHER NOTES---

Sadly, this is short, due to my inability to desing levels under presure, but hopefully it will be fun enough. It includes a few simple puzzles which should kep you busy.

All the controls listed are necessary to complete the game.
